**小刀**（knife）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成，可以用于[近战](/index.php?title=%E8%BF%91%E6%88%98\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "近战 (page does not exist)")或[投掷](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%95%E6%8E%B7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "投掷 (page does not exist)")攻击。

[武士](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武士 (page does not exist)")职业的角色称其为**锥**（shito）。

## 生成

小刀在随机生成的武器中占2%（包括在地面上、[死亡掉落](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E6%8E%89%E8%90%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "死亡掉落 (page does not exist)")或[商店](/index.php?title=%E5%95%86%E5%BA%97\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "商店 (page does not exist)")中生成）。

小刀会在多种怪物的[起始物品](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")中出现：

- [魔多兽人](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E5%A4%9A%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔多兽人 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄3的概率携带一把小刀[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。
- [兽人队长](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%E9%98%9F%E9%95%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人队长 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄6的概率携带一把小刀[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。
- [骷髅](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%B7%E9%AB%85\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骷髅 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄6的概率携带一把小刀[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。
- 如果[岩德军团](/index.php?title=%E5%B2%A9%E5%BE%B7%E5%86%9B%E5%9B%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "岩德军团 (page does not exist)")士兵和[警卫员](/index.php?title=%E8%AD%A6%E5%8D%AB%E5%91%98\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "警卫员 (page does not exist)")生成时的主武器是[长柄武器](/wiki/%E9%95%BF%E6%9F%84%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "长柄武器")，他们有50%的概率获得一把小刀作为副武器[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。
- [古墓尸妖](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%A4%E5%A2%93%E5%B0%B8%E5%A6%96\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "古墓尸妖 (page does not exist)")和[戒灵](/index.php?title=%E6%88%92%E7%81%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "戒灵 (page does not exist)")生成时会携带一把小刀[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。
- 所有[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄58（约1.7%）的概率获得一把小刀。

## 小刀技能

| 小刀   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| ---- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 最大等级 | [角色](/index.php?title=%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "角色 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| 基础   | - [考古学家](/index.php?title=%E8%80%83%E5%8F%A4%E5%AD%A6%E5%AE%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "考古学家 (page does not exist)")、[骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| 熟练   | * [穴居人](/index.php?title=%E7%A9%B4%E5%B1%85%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "穴居人 (page does not exist)")、[游侠](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E4%BE%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游侠 (page does not exist)")、[武士](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武士 (page does not exist)")、[游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)")、[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师 (page does not exist)") |
| 老练   | - [医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生 (page does not exist)")、[盗贼](/index.php?title=%E7%9B%97%E8%B4%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "盗贼 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |

以下武器使用小刀[技能](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%80%E8%83%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "技能 (page does not exist)")：

- 小刀
- [小剑](/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E5%89%91 "小剑")
- [手术刀](/wiki/%E6%89%8B%E6%9C%AF%E5%88%80 "手术刀")
- [蠕虫齿](/wiki/%E8%A0%95%E8%99%AB%E9%BD%BF "蠕虫齿")
- [迅捷小刀](/wiki/%E8%BF%85%E6%8D%B7%E5%B0%8F%E5%88%80 "迅捷小刀")

小刀是游戏中唯一一种由[医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生 (page does not exist)")角色使用时有[多重射击](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%9A%E9%87%8D%E5%B0%84%E5%87%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "多重射击 (page does not exist)")加成的[远程武器](/wiki/%E8%BF%9C%E7%A8%8B%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "远程武器")[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)。

不存在[神器](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神器武器 (page does not exist)")类小刀。

## 描述

小刀是NetHack中伤害最低的武器之一，特定职业（比如[医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生 (page does not exist)")）可以考虑收集小刀作为远程弹药使用，不过，小刀并不如匕首那样常见。

## 历史

小刀最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

在[NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3")及更早版本中，小刀是不能[多重射击](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%9A%E9%87%8D%E5%B0%84%E5%87%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "多重射击 (page does not exist)")的[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)。自[NetHack 3.6.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.0 "NetHack 3.6.0")开始，所有[可堆叠](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%AF%E5%A0%86%E5%8F%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "可堆叠 (page does not exist)")的武器均可多重射击，只要你将相应的武器[技能](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%80%E8%83%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "技能 (page does not exist)")提升到熟练或更高[\[8\]](#cite_note-8)。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Knife/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

In variants that incorporate the [Pirate](/wiki/Pirate "Pirate") role, all Pirates start the game with two +1 knives.

### NetHack: The Next Generation

In [NetHack: The Next Generation](/wiki/NetHack:_The_Next_Generation "NetHack: The Next Generation"), the [tooth of an algolian suntiger](/wiki/Tooth_of_an_algolian_suntiger "Tooth of an algolian suntiger") is a new weapon that uses the knife skill.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") a knife can produce a stiletto and vice versa.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), knives deals 1d5 versus small monsters and 1d3 versus large monsters. dNetHack also adds the [spoon](/wiki/Spoon "Spoon"), a [weapon-tool](/wiki/Weapon-tool "Weapon-tool") that uses the knife skill. [Snickersnee](/wiki/Snickersnee "Snickersnee")'s [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") changed from a [katana](/wiki/Katana "Katana") to a knife.

[Binders](/wiki/Binder "Binder") that are not [dwarves](/wiki/Dwarf_\(starting_race\) "Dwarf (starting race)"), [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") or [elves](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)") start the game with a rusty knife.

[Staves](/wiki/Stave "Stave") are a type of [ward](/wiki/Ward "Ward") that can be carved into a wooden weapon with any type of weapon that uses the knife skill - all dwarven characters begin the game with a knife to carve staves with, as well as a wooden club to carve into.

[Peasants](/wiki/Peasant "Peasant") may be generated with a knife.

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), the kitchen is a type of [themed room](/wiki/Themed_room "Themed room") that contains knives and other cooking necessities. The slaughterhouse is a [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom")-exclusive special maze room that also contains several knives.

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), [Carnwennan](/index.php?title=Carnwennan\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Carnwennan (page does not exist)") is a lawful artifact knife that has +d3 to-hit and deals +d8 damage versus all monsters. It confers [searching](/wiki/Searching "Searching") and [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth") and can be [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") to toggle [invisibility](/wiki/Invisibility "Invisibility").

A knife can be combined with an [iron chain](/wiki/Iron_chain "Iron chain") at a [furnace](/wiki/Furnace "Furnace") to create a [spiked chain](/wiki/Spiked_chain "Spiked chain").

### EvilHack

[EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") adds [Secespita](/wiki/Secespita "Secespita"), a chaotic artifact [copper](/wiki/Copper "Copper") knife that acts as the first [sacrifice gift](/wiki/Sacrifice_gift "Sacrifice gift") artifact for [Infidels](/wiki/Infidel "Infidel"). EvilHack also merges the knife skill into the dagger skill as of version 0.8.3.

[Cultists](/wiki/Cultist "Cultist") have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with a knife.

A knife can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining 2 [arrows](/wiki/Arrow "Arrow") and 2 [darts](/wiki/Dart "Dart"). Knives can be used to forge several items:

- A knife can be combined with 2 arrows to create a dagger.
- A knife can be combined with 2 [elven arrows](/wiki/Elven_arrow "Elven arrow") to create an [elven dagger](/wiki/Elven_dagger "Elven dagger").
- A knife can be combined with 2 [orcish arrows](/wiki/Orcish_arrow "Orcish arrow") to create an [orcish dagger](/wiki/Orcish_dagger "Orcish dagger").
- A knife can be combined with 2 [crossbow bolts](/wiki/Crossbow_bolt "Crossbow bolt") to create a stiletto.
- A knife can be combined with a stiletto to create a scalpel.
- A knife can be combined with a [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword") to create a [scimitar](/wiki/Scimitar "Scimitar").
- A knife can be combined with an [orcish short sword](/wiki/Orcish_short_sword "Orcish short sword") to create an [orcish scimitar](/wiki/Orcish_scimitar "Orcish scimitar").
- A knife can be combined with a [spear](/wiki/Spear "Spear") to create a [spetum](/wiki/Spetum "Spetum").
- A knife can be combined with a [war hammer](/wiki/War_hammer "War hammer") to create a [dented pot](/wiki/Dented_pot "Dented pot").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, the [Diver](/wiki/Diver "Diver") starts the game with a +2 rustproof knife. Player [vampires](/wiki/Vampire_\(starting_race_in_SLASH%27EM\) "Vampire (starting race in SLASH'EM)") can always reach a minimum of Basic in knife skill.

Two artifact knives exist in SlashTHEM, and some other artifacts also use the knife skill:

- [Shadowblade](/wiki/Shadowblade "Shadowblade") is a chaotic artifact knife that acts as the guaranteed first sacrifice gift for [Convicts](/wiki/Convict "Convict").
- The [Deluxe Yendorian Knife](/index.php?title=Deluxe_Yendorian_Knife\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Deluxe Yendorian Knife (page does not exist)") is a neutral artifact knife that acts as the [Chef](/wiki/Chef "Chef") [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact"). It has +6 to-hit and deals +20 damage versus all monsters, confers [telepathy](/wiki/Telepathy "Telepathy") and [acid resistance](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance") while carried, and grants [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance") while wielded.
- [Spineseeker](/wiki/Spineseeker "Spineseeker") is an artifact stiletto.
- [Wormbiter](/index.php?title=Wormbiter\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Wormbiter (page does not exist)") is an artifact crysknife.
- [Oathkeeper](/index.php?title=Oathkeeper\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Oathkeeper (page does not exist)") is an artifact stiletto.

### Hack'EM

[Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM") adds Carnwennan from SpliceHack and Secespita from EvilHack.

In addition to EvilHack forge recipes, 2 darts can be combined with 2 orcish arrows or elven arrows to create a knife.

## 百科文本

### 小刀

Possibly perceiving an expression of dubiosity on their  
faces, the globetrotter went on adhering to his adventures.  
  
\-- And I seen a man killed in Trieste by an Italian chap.  
Knife in his back. Knife like that.  
  
Whilst speaking he produced a dangerous looking clasp knife,  
quite in keeping with his character, and held it in the  
striking position.  
  
\-- In a knockingshop it was count of a tryon between two  
smugglers. Fellow hid behind a door, come up behind him.  
Like that. Prepare to meet your God, says he. Chuck! It  
went into his back up to the butt.

\[ Ulysses, by James Joyce ]

### 锥

A Japanese stabbing knife.

小刀（knife）是NetHack中的一种武器。它由铁制成，可以用于近战或投掷攻击。

武士职业的角色称其为锥（shito）。

生成

小刀在随机生成的武器中占2%（包括在地面上、死亡掉落或商店中生成）。

小刀会在多种怪物的起始物品中出现：

  • 魔多兽人生成时有1⁄3的概率携带一把小刀[1]。
  • 兽人队长生成时有1⁄6的概率携带一把小刀[2]。
  • 骷髅生成时有1⁄6的概率携带一把小刀[3]。
  • 如果岩德军团士兵和警卫员生成时的主武器是长柄武器，他们有50%的概率获得一把小刀作为副武器[4]。
  • 古墓尸妖和戒灵生成时会携带一把小刀[5]。
  • 所有玩家怪物生成时有1⁄58（约1.7%）的概率获得一把小刀。

小刀技能

小刀

  • 迅捷小刀

小刀是游戏中唯一一种由医生角色使用时有多重射击加成的远程武器[6]。

不存在神器类小刀。

描述

小刀是NetHack中伤害最低的武器之一，特定职业（比如医生）可以考虑收集小刀作为远程弹药使用，不过，小刀并不如匕首那样常见。

历史

小刀最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

在NetHack 3.4.3及更早版本中，小刀是不能多重射击的[7]。自NetHack 3.6.0开始，所有可堆叠的武器均可多重射击，只要你将相应的武器技能提升到熟练或更高[8]。

Variants

In variants that incorporate the Pirate role, all Pirates start the game with two +1 knives.

NetHack: The Next Generation

In NetHack: The Next Generation, the tooth of an algolian suntiger is a new weapon that uses the knife skill.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, upgrading a knife can produce a stiletto and vice versa.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, knives deals 1d5 versus small monsters and 1d3 versus large monsters. dNetHack also adds the spoon, a weapon-tool that uses the knife skill. Snickersnee's base item changed from a katana to a knife.

Binders that are not dwarves, drow or elves start the game with a rusty knife.

Staves are a type of ward that can be carved into a wooden weapon with any type of weapon that uses the knife skill - all dwarven characters begin the game with a knife to carve staves with, as well as a wooden club to carve into.

Peasants may be generated with a knife.

xNetHack

In xNetHack, the kitchen is a type of themed room that contains knives and other cooking necessities. The slaughterhouse is a Gehennom-exclusive special maze room that also contains several knives.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, Carnwennan is a lawful artifact knife that has +d3 to-hit and deals +d8 damage versus all monsters. It confers searching and stealth and can be invoked to toggle invisibility.

A knife can be combined with an iron chain at a furnace to create a spiked chain.

EvilHack

EvilHack adds Secespita, a chaotic artifact copper knife that acts as the first sacrifice gift artifact for Infidels. EvilHack also merges the knife skill into the dagger skill as of version 0.8.3.

Cultists have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with a knife.

A knife can be created at a forge by combining 2 arrows and 2 darts. Knives can be used to forge several items:

  • A knife can be combined with 2 arrows to create a dagger.
  • A knife can be combined with 2 elven arrows to create an elven dagger.
  • A knife can be combined with 2 orcish arrows to create an orcish dagger.
  • A knife can be combined with 2 crossbow bolts to create a stiletto.
  • A knife can be combined with a stiletto to create a scalpel.
  • A knife can be combined with a short sword to create a scimitar.
  • A knife can be combined with an orcish short sword to create an orcish scimitar.
  • A knife can be combined with a spear to create a spetum.
  • A knife can be combined with a war hammer to create a dented pot.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, in addition to SLASH'EM details, the Diver starts the game with a +2 rustproof knife. Player vampires can always reach a minimum of Basic in knife skill.

Two artifact knives exist in SlashTHEM, and some other artifacts also use the knife skill:

  • Shadowblade is a chaotic artifact knife that acts as the guaranteed first sacrifice gift for Convicts.
  • The Deluxe Yendorian Knife is a neutral artifact knife that acts as the Chef quest artifact. It has +6 to-hit and deals +20 damage versus all monsters, confers telepathy and acid resistance while carried, and grants fire resistance while wielded.
  • Spineseeker is an artifact stiletto.
  • Wormbiter is an artifact crysknife.
  • Oathkeeper is an artifact stiletto.

Hack'EM

Hack'EM adds Carnwennan from SpliceHack and Secespita from EvilHack.

In addition to EvilHack forge recipes, 2 darts can be combined with 2 orcish arrows or elven arrows to create a knife.

'''小刀'''（knife）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[武器]]。它由[[铁]]制成，可以用于[[近战]]或[[投掷]]攻击。

[[武士]]职业的角色称其为'''锥'''（shito）。

== 生成 ==
小刀在随机生成的武器中占2%（包括在地面上、[[死亡掉落]]或[[商店]]中生成）。

小刀会在多种怪物的[[怪物起始物品|起始物品]]中出现：

* [[魔多兽人]]生成时有{{frac|3}}的概率携带一把小刀{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|407|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。
* [[兽人队长]]生成时有{{frac|6}}的概率携带一把小刀{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|400|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。
* [[骷髅]]生成时有{{frac|6}}的概率携带一把小刀{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|476|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。
* 如果[[岩德军团]]士兵和[[警卫员]]生成时的主武器是[[长柄武器]]，他们有50%的概率获得一把小刀作为副武器{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|195|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。
* [[古墓尸妖]]和[[戒灵]]生成时会携带一把小刀{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|473|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。
* 所有[[玩家怪物]]生成时有{{frac|58}}（约1.7%）的概率获得一把小刀。

== 小刀技能 ==
{{knife skill table/zh-CN}}

* 小刀
* [[小剑]]
* [[手术刀]]
* [[蠕虫齿]]
* [[迅捷小刀]]
